ygData.subject: Re: Chant of Battle and Jonthan's Whistling Warsong
ygData.msgSnippet: When you say VERY much sped up are you referring to some time in Beta or currently? Someone I know who was a 35th level bard in Beta said 7 and 10 were
ygData.messageBody:
When you say 'VERY much sped up' are you referring to some time in Beta or
currently? Someone I know who was a 35th level bard in Beta said 7 and 10
were broken and would give tremendous speed when played together but they
have been 'fixed' to not double on the attack speed.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 9:00 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Chant of Battle and Jonthan's Whistling Warsong


From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>

The Anthem is much better, since it increases your attack speed. The
effect is subtle, but it is definately there, believe me. It also
stacks with Jonthan's Warsong, so your attack speed is VERY much sped
up, and your strength increases by a huge amount. I play these two
songs when soloing even now at level 17. (And even higher with my high
level bard in Beta).

Jyzan


Roop Dirump wrote:
>
> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
> Just got anthem de arms, and really wondering whether the ol' chant might
be
> better for a group (since I notice both can't be juggled). I suppose
Anthem
> de arms is better, rather have 10 strength over some dex and strength?
>
> Maybe I'll use the chant and whistle when alone, and anthem with groups.
Is
> that what others do?
>
> Roop
